text: Meunyo awak nyan jipeudong dawa Jilawan gata jipeudong hujah Takheun di lon nyoe ka lonpeujok droe Muka deungon dhoe ubak Potallah Ureueng ikot lon pih saban cit that Iseulam meuhat bandum menyerah Teuma lom takheun bak ahli kitab Ngon muchrek Arab nyang buta harah Peue gata bandum tatem Iseulam Meu jitem meunan peutunyok Allah Meunyo han jitem ka Iheuh tapeutroh Hana peue le roh gata cok langkah Tuhan Neukalon bandum buet hamba Teuma di gata hana le salah
